name: Nikita Semkin- Timeless Soft
raw_text:
Nikita Semkin About me I am a dedicated software developer with solid experience in full-stack development. My focus is on Java, PHP, and modern frontend technologies such as Angular and React. I thrive in dynamic environments, enjoy solving complex challenges, and continuously learn new technologies to expand my expertise.  Experience Timeless Soft GmbH (seit 11/2023) Software-/Web developer, various technologies  eMundo Austria GmbH (09/2021 – 10/2023) Java Software-Ingineur   Skidata (SKIDATA SSP eCom) (01/2020 - 09/2022) Fullstack Developer   Transport und Logistik JOWIBO-Projekt  (12/2021 – 06/2022) Junior Software Developer  Education & Training Paris Lodron University of Salzburg  (1072014 – 06/2019) Bachelor Computer Science  Udemy Academy Angular – The Complete Guide (2023 Edition) Docker & Kubernetes – The Complete Guide        Erlaaer Straße 60/101 A-1230 Wien     +43 699 11 60 49 60     job@tlsoft.at    Professional Skill Java / Spring Boot / Angular  PostgreSQL / HTML / CSS / TypeScript  JUnit / Mockito / Spring MVC / Spring Security / Kanban / RabbitMQ  Liquibase / Kibana / JSON / SQL / IntelliJ IDEA / Nexus / Integration Testing  Microsoft Teams / GitLab CI / Postman  Google Workspace / Cypress / macOS  Sass / PrimeNG / Jira / Git / GitLab  SonarQube / Maven / JavaScript / CH2 - CommonHTML 2 / HSQLDB / Gradle Thymeleaf / Tailwind CSS  Languages Mother tongue:  German Other languages: English (Fluent) 

  
 Coursera Zertifikat Introduction to Discrete Mathematics for Computer Science  HTB Academy Bug Bounty Hunter
